tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Attentive, informative, compassionate, friendly and incredibly caring...I very much appreciate everything she has done for me!! She puts you at ease and I am very blessed to have her as my doctor. She is never too busy to take our calls and messages. We visited her for infertility problem and i am totally confident that we are on our way to success due to her hard work and efforts. Thank you very much for everything you have done for us. If someone is looking for a doctor for infertility issues i would recommend her without any doubt. She is just amazing!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Divya has helped me with a little miracle in my life. I have been trying to conceive since 5 years but nothing helped, post which we decided to visit Dr. Divya. We had consulted several other gynac and fertility specialists but nothing helped. The comfort and guidance provided here is so much on point and she has selflessly worked on my case and kept a check on me. Finally after the first round of treatment of IUI, i have been blessed with a little miracle baby. We call our baby a miracle because its nothing short of miracle for me and my husband. The continuous support, checkup, follow up also needs to be mentioned here. Dr. Divya has taken care of me like a family and really she is a huge blessing for me. This happiness wouldnt knock our doors without her guidance at every step of pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After visiting 3 gynaecologists who I wasn't happy with, I am so greatful I came across Dr Divya. She spent more than an hour listening and counselling me patiently, addressing all my issues. She explained me the problems in detail and helped with an overall health management plan. She is the most caring and genuine doctor you would come across. Unless absolutely needed, she wouldn't unnecessary put you under heavy medication. She is one of the rarest caring and kind doctor who will check on your health progress often personally while you're under treatment. You're rest assured to be taken care of for all your issues aptly. I have felt the most comfortable and relieved under her treatment. It's commendable how she cares for her individual patient's health so much, you feel you're in the best hands.

Consultation was good. Doctor is friendly and knows stuff. But then we were charged almost double the consultation fees just because doctor took time to understand the problem and then give her opinion. That's just not done. Have never seen this before wherein charges are as per the time. And after protesting, we were shown a printed notice which said that more than 20 mins of consultation will cost extra. That should have been mentioned on Practo in the first place or in fact before the consultation began. Still, time duration of any consultation can only be regulated by the doctor and not the patients, so not sure how the extra charges apply.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Infertility in Women,Infertility And Pcod,
review: Shes an amazing doctor. Her in-depth explanation and at the same time making you feel comfortable is the best thing about Dr. Divya. Highly recommended !!
